title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4409.7 - Dispute resolution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4409.7 - Dispute resolution

State Regulations

Disputes between any regional corporation, commission or
other organization authorized to conduct off-track pari-mutuel betting in the

State and any track or other person, association or corporation with respect to
the collection or payment of the surcharge, shall be submitted in writing to
the commission for determination. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4409.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
